doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
creation: early 19th century; alteration: late 1920s; alteration: 1930; alteration: circa 1989; alteration: 1997
Albemarle Hotel--McGehees Tavern--James Oldhams Tavern 1828--Hardins Tavern before 1815-1827--Alexander Von Thelen Home

early 19th century House/Tavern: 2 Story Brick, Roman Ionic Tetrastyle Portico, Double Pile, 5 Bay, Balcony, Hipped Roof, rear Piazza; c1920 House: 2 Story Brick, 6 Column Portico, 5 Bay, Hipped Roof, Transom with Sidelight, 6/6; Outbuildings: 32'x48' 1 Story Brick Stable, 16'x28' Tobacco Factory, 12'x18' Frame Dairy with Smokehouse above, Barn, early 20th century Log Outbuilding, Cemetery
James Tuley, Architect circa 1989--Jack Laramore, Architect 1997
survey data: Mutual Assurance Society Insurance Policy
Rt 676 & Rt 738, Northwest of Ivy, at Morgantown
